title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Information about the processing of your personal data

content.intro: With the following privacy policy, we would like to inform you about which types of your personal data (hereinafter also referred to briefly as "data") we process for which purposes and to what extent. The privacy policy applies to all processing of personal data carried out by us, both in the context of providing our services and in particular on our websites, in mobile applications and within external online presences, such as our social media profiles (hereinafter collectively referred to as "online offer").
content.gender-neutral: The terms used are not gender-specific.

processing-overview.title: Overview of Processing
processing-overview.intro: The following overview summarizes the types of data processed and the purposes of their processing and refers to the data subjects.

processing-purposes.title: Purposes of Processing
processing-purposes.item5: Provision of our online offer and user-friendliness

legal-basis.title: Relevant Legal Basis
legal-basis.intro-label: Relevant legal basis according to GDPR:
legal-basis.intro: Below you will find an overview of the legal basis of the GDPR on which we process personal data. Please note that in addition to the regulations of the GDPR, national data protection requirements may apply in your or our country of residence or domicile.

legal-ground1.title: Consent (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. a) GDPR)
legal-ground1.description: The data subject has given their consent to the processing of personal data concerning them for one or more specific purposes.

legal-ground2.title: Contract fulfillment and pre-contractual inquiries (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. b) GDPR)
legal-ground2.description: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which the data subject is party or in order to take steps at the request of the data subject prior to entering into a contract.

legal-ground3.title: Legitimate interests (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f) GDPR)
legal-ground3.description: Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party.

national-regulations.title: National Data Protection Regulations in Germany
national-regulations.content: In addition to the data protection regulations of the GDPR, national data protection regulations apply in Germany. This includes in particular the Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).

security-measures.title: Security Measures
security-measures.intro: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures in accordance with legal requirements, taking into account the state of the art, implementation costs and the nature, scope, circumstances and purposes of processing as well as the different probabilities of occurrence and the extent of the threat to the rights and freedoms of natural persons, in order to ensure a level of protection appropriate to the risk.

tls-ssl.title: TLS/SSL Encryption (HTTPS)
tls-ssl.content: To protect the data of users that is transmitted via our online services from unauthorized access, we use TLS/SSL encryption technology.

ip-masking.title: IP Address Shortening
ip-masking.content: If IP addresses are processed and processing of a complete IP address is not necessary, the IP address is shortened (IP masking).

data-storage.title: General Information on Data Storage and Deletion
data-storage.intro: We delete personal data that we process in accordance with legal provisions as soon as the underlying consent is revoked or there are no further legal grounds for processing.

user-rights.title: Rights of Data Subjects
user-rights.intro: As a data subject, you have various rights under the GDPR, which arise in particular from Articles 15 to 21 GDPR:

right1.title: Right to Information
right1.description: Confirmation of processing and information about your data

right2.title: Right to Rectification
right2.description: Completion and correction of incorrect data

right4.title: Data Portability
right4.description: Transfer of your data in structured format

right5.title: Right to Object
right5.description: Objection to the processing of your data

web-hosting.title: Provision of Online Services and Web Hosting
web-hosting.intro: We process user data in order to be able to provide them with our online services. For this purpose, we process the user's IP address, which is necessary to transmit the content and functions of our online services.

server-logs.title: Server Log Files
server-logs.content: Access to our online offer is logged in the form of "server log files". Log file information is stored for a maximum of 30 days.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.intro: The term "cookies" refers to functions that store information on users' end devices and read it from them. We use cookies in accordance with legal requirements.

type1.title: Session Cookies
type1.description: Temporary cookies are deleted after the browser is closed

type2.title: Permanent Cookies
type2.description: Remain stored even after closing the browser

contact-management.title: Contact and Inquiry Management
contact-management.intro: When contacting us (e.g. by post, contact form, email, telephone or via social media) as well as in the context of existing user and business relationships, the information of the inquiring persons is processed, insofar as this is necessary to answer the contact inquiries.

contact-form.title: Contact Form
contact-form.content: When contacting us via our contact form, we process the transmitted personal data to answer your inquiry.
